data.Answer: It’s about one hundred meters from here.

data.Read: Go down this road and turn left at the first crossing.
data.Answer: Go down this road and turn left at the first crossing.

data.Read: Walk on for about two hundred meters and it’ll be on your left.
data.Answer: Walk on for about two hundred meters and it’ll be on your left.

data.Read: Go straight ahead to the second crossing, then turn right. You can see it on your right hand side.
data.Answer: Go straight ahead to the second crossing, then turn right. You can see it on your right hand side.

data.Read: Turn right and go straight ahead 200 meters then ask someone else when you get there.

data.Read: Go straight and turn right. You can see it there.
data.Answer: Go straight and turn right. You can see it there.
